Uses of Package
io.atomix.storage.buffer

  • Packages that use io.atomix.storage.buffer 
    Package Description
    io.atomix.primitive.service
    Provides classes and interfaces for defining distributed primitive state machines.
    io.atomix.protocols.raft
    Provides classes and interfaces for managing Raft clients and servers.
    io.atomix.protocols.raft.storage.snapshot
    Provides classes and interfaces that aid in storing, loading, and installing on-disk state machine snapshots.
    io.atomix.storage.buffer
    Provides a low-level Buffer abstraction backed by on- or off-heap memory, memory mapped files, or RandomAccessFile.
    io.atomix.storage.journal
    Provides a low-level journal abstraction for appending to logs and managing segmented logs.
  • Classes in io.atomix.storage.buffer used by io.atomix.primitive.service

    BufferInput
    Readable buffer.
    BufferOutput
